Assumptions: shade cacao; refer table 4; Net cash flow (revenue minus expenses) for shaded hybrid cacao: 109,070,000 Ghanaian cedi over 80 years lifecycle. Converts to 1,363,375 cedi per year. According to Wikipedia in 2007 $1US was equal to 9300-9600 cedi. Let’s say 9450. NPM per year was thus $144.27 2007 dollars, or $164.47 2014 dollars.
